name: Midnight Ocean
description:
Midnight ocean is a short visual adventure game with puzzles where you go through the 5 phases of duel when losing a loved one.

This game was created for participate on the Spain Game Devs Jam II.

The assets used on this game are downloaded from Unity Asset Store and the sounds from FreeSound.org.

Controls:

  • Move: W, A, S, D
  • Run: Left Shift
  • Look: Mouse
  • Exit game: ESC

Headphones recommended.
